transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Executive: Haan ji. Good morning Pandey ji. Alok baat kar raha hu sir IndiaMART se relationship manager. Kaise ho sir?
Customer: Badhiya.
Executive: Uh IndiaMART pe aapka
Customer: Ek ghante baad call kariyega, ek ghante baad.
